items.content_html: Google TaskBoard Lite is a simplified task management application inspired by Google's TaskBoard interface. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this lightweight version focuses on local storage for task persistence, making it beginner-friendly. Enjoy a familiar look and feel while managing your tasks efficiently.
items.title: rahulpaul127/Google-TasksBoard-Clone: Google TaskBoard Lite is a simplified task management application inspired by Google's TaskBoard interface. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this lightweight version focuses on local storage for task persistence, making it beginner-friendly. Enjoy a familiar look and feel while managing your tasks efficiently.
